projects.name: CF-Knockout
projects.description: Introduced a new style of contests for competitive programming. Implemented Authentication and Authorization using Firebase service and react-router-dom library. Devised room feature where people can create and join private rooms, using Socket.io (Websockets).

projects.name: RENT-IT
projects.description: A Home Renting Platform. Implemented Cookie based Authentication and Authorization for Landlords and Tenants. Used Firebase Storage for storing images.

projects.name: AVL Tree Visualizer
projects.description: Built a comprehensive visualizer which shows how AVL trees work. Speed control over the visualization, responsive and user-friendly UI and all operations on tree are supported with detailed information.

experiences.description: Implemented Stop Loss and Limit order system for the Application using latest System Design principles. Employed MixPanel to generate User Activity insights and understand the areas which needs more focus. Conducted thorough testing and debugging to identify and resolve bugs, resulting in a robust and reliable application.
Resolved 350+ Doubts of many students related to Competitive Programming and DSA. Took 10+ lectures on various concepts like Binary Search and Dynamic Programming.

full_output.name: Pawankumar Nandagiri
achievements_and_awards: Ranked 92nd globally out of 15,000 in Codeforces 934(Div. 2). - Standings
